entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
